page.title: 09Badlesmere : Employment
page.content: Farming is the only industry - 9O% of agricultural land is tenant farmed. Main farmers are the Scutt family (around Badlesmere) and the Holmes family, both of whom farm land mainly owned by the Sondes Estate, employing between them some lO local people. A one-man jobbing concern on Badlesmere Lees employs casual labour. The Badlesmere Stores (general provisions)is run by a family as is the Deepdene Riding Stables (provision for l9 horses) which currently has 4 trainee instructors. Family breadwinners must travel to London (l hour by train from Faversham), the Medway towns, Ashford or Canterbury. Unemployment in the area is currently l4.5% compared with the national average of l3.5%.
